timeline.message:
Introduce the quarkus.container-image.image property

This property is meant to specify the entire image string
as one would use on the docker command line or as is
found in CI systems like GitLab (whose CI_REGISTRY_IMAGE)
was used as a model for this

Fixes: #8588

Make container image extensions consistent in image usage

Use ContainerImageInfoBuildItem wherever possible instead of
using ContainerImageConfig
Use Quarkus version instead of Jib version in metadata
Use Quarkus version instead of Jib version in metadata
